subject: Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Movistar won the opening team time trial in the Tour of Spain on Saturday with their local favorite Jonathan Castroviejo finishing as the race’s first leader.
snippet: Movistar won the opening team time trial in the Tour of Spain on Saturday with their local favorite Jonathan Castroviejo finishing as the race’s first leader.
